com.genband.mobile.api.services.im

Interface ImServiceInterface


  • public interface ImServiceInterface
    Interface definition for defining instant message service methods.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Creates a new outgoing IM object with predefined values ( Type & Charset).

      Creates a new outgoing IM object.

      Sets the handler for IMService to receive incoming IM.

      • createOutGoingIM

        OutgoingImInterface createOutGoingIM(java.lang.String message,
                                     java.lang.String toAddress)
                              throws MobileException
        Creates a new outgoing IM object with predefined values ( Type & Charset).
        Parameters:
        message - instant message text
        toAddress - target address
        Returns:
        OutgoingImInterface
        Throws:
        MobileException - when the target address information is null or empty

      • createOutGoingIM

        OutgoingImInterface createOutGoingIM(java.lang.String message,
                                     java.lang.String toAddress,
                                     java.lang.String charset,
                                     java.lang.String type)
                              throws MobileException
        Creates a new outgoing IM object.
        Parameters:
        message - instant message text
        toAddress - target address
        charset - character set information related to the message provided
        type - type of the target (A2 etc)
        Returns:
        OutgoingImInterface
        Throws:
        MobileException - when the target address information is null or empty
        Since:
        2.0.0
